Html:
• I try to see work of IconOverlayHandlerIdentifier. (ATLShellExtIconOverlayHandler)
    • So, I download example. Build project. Register dll - dll registered succesfully. Kill process of explorer. Restart explorer. Create file Sample.bmp - no any overlay on icon file. Where did I mistake? (I work on Windows XP)

Did you find the solution, I'm having the same problem working with VS 2010 and Win7 X64.

I'm starting to find it related to the way the registry is made...

I've followed this guide and still the same problem.

http://www.codeproject.com/KB/shell/overlayicon.aspx
Try to disable the Groove Explorer Icon Overlay 3 (GFS Folder ) with ShellExView, in case you've got Office Groove or Sharepoint installed on your machine.

Did you find solution ?

same problem for me vs2010 win7 x64 

the dll was build and registered correctly (with Admin rights ) with the right registry entries, and steel not working !
